Faq.faqSubtitle: Find answers to frequently asked questions about our platform and services.
Faq.faqDesc: Here are some frequently asked questions about mentorship, our work, and how to get in touch.
Faq.faqTitle1: What do we offer to users?
Faq.faqTitle2: Do you collaborate with other developers or businesses?
Faq.faqTitle4: How long does it take to learn web development?
Faq.faqTitle5: Are your lessons free or paid?
Faq.faqTitle6: How much does website development cost?
Faq.faqTitle8: Is your mentorship/lessons suitable for complete beginners?
Faq.faqTitle9: Can I suggest topics for future lessons or content?
Faq.faqTitle10: Can I access your lessons on mobile devices?
Faq.faqDesc1: We provide a wide range of services and resources to help individuals and businesses succeed online. Our offerings include: Web Development Courses: From beginner to advanced courses on web development. Custom Web Development Services: Tailored solutions for businesses and individuals. Mentorship: Personalized guidance for aspiring developers. Resources: Free and premium tools, templates, and learning materials to enhance your skills.
Faq.faqDesc2: Yes, we are open to collaborations. If you have a project or idea you’d like to work on together, feel free to get in touch.
Faq.faqDesc3: You can contact me through the following channels: Email: anush.chakhoyan.work@gmail.com Contact Form: Fill out the form on our website, and we’ll respond quickly. Contact Page: Navigate to the Contact page from the menu.
Faq.faqDesc4: The time required to learn web development depends on your dedication and the complexity of the skills you want to acquire. With consistent effort, you can learn the basics in a few months and become proficient within a year.
Faq.faqDesc5: We offer both free and paid options: Free Resources: Learning materials, blog posts, and basic guides. Paid Courses: In-depth lessons, projects, and certifications.
Faq.faqDesc6: Request a quote, and we will provide you with a price estimate for website development based on your technical requirements. The more detailed you specify the website components, the more accurate the cost estimate will be for development and ongoing maintenance. Contact: Navigate to the Contact page from the menu.
Faq.faqDesc7: Yes, we offer one-on-one personal mentorship for those who want tailored guidance. Whether you need career advice or want to accelerate your learning, we are here to help.
Faq.faqDesc8: Absolutely! Our beginner-friendly lessons are designed for those with no prior experience in web development. I start with the basics and gradually build your skills.
Faq.faqDesc9: Of course! We appreciate your feedback and suggestions. Let me know what topics you’d like us to cover in future content.
Faq.faqDesc10: Yes, my lessons are accessible on both web and mobile devices. You can learn on the go.

About.whatWeBuild1: We build digital websites that add value to your business. Every pixel is thoughtfully crafted to create value, driving your brand to success.
About.whatWeBuild2: Our websites don't just present information, they create memorable experiences. We believe that every business has its own unique story, and our job is to portray it in the digital world in a way that engages your audience and builds trust.
About.whatWeBuild3: Because a website is not just a product, it's a journey, a story. It's the face of your business in the digital space, and we make it more than a tool, making it the key to your success.
About.whatWeBuild4: Our team combines creativity, technology, and strategy to create a website for your business that is not only beautiful, but also highly effective. Let's create a website together that will truly differentiate you from the competition.
About.visionDescription: We provide a comprehensive approach to web development, guiding you from idea to completion. Our services include building creative, functional, and user-friendly websites, tailored to your needs. Whether you need a personal portfolio, a business website, or an advanced e-commerce platform, we ensure a seamless experience, assisting with design choices, domain setup, and the overall project structure.
About.myFocusDescription: Our focus is on creating websites that are not only visually appealing but also optimized for productivity, accessibility, and user engagement.
About.whereSimplicityIsKey: a place where simplicity drives success, business is built with purpose, and every detail matters.
About.aboutPurposeOfWork: Every project is crafted with purpose, every detail refined with care, and every idea brought to life with clarity. Join me in building meaningful digital experiences that inspire and empower.
About.whatIs1: your creative tech space where beautiful websites come to life and frontend skills grow. Whether you're looking to build a brand online or start your journey into web development, Anush.tech offers tailored solutions and mentorship to help you grow confidently in the digital world.
About.whatIs2: If you want to have a professional presence on the Internet or learn to create modern websites, Anush.tech is the right place. We believe that learning should be simple, motivating and practical. At Anush.tech, you will receive the necessary knowledge and support to bring your ideas to life, combining innovation, design and technology.
About.foundersQuote1: Anush Chakhoyan is the creative and technical brain behind Anush.tech. She is a frontend professional with a passion for programming and interface design who created this platform to make modern web technologies accessible to everyone.
About.foundersQuote2: Anush believes that anyone can create beautiful and powerful websites when they have the right guidance, tools, and inspiration. Through Anush.tech, she not only helps businesses get online, but also mentors people who want to learn programming with a creative and practical approach.

WhatWeOffer.transformYourVisionIntoReality:
Transform your vision into reality 
 with our tailored solutions.
WhatWeOffer.fromStrategyToExecution: From strategy to execution, We help individuals and businesses bring their ideas to life with expert guidance, seamless collaboration, and top-notch development.
WhatWeOffer.websiteCreationHint: Your Digital Presence Matters. Crafting High-Performance, Visually Stunning Websites for Your Brand
WhatWeOffer.websiteCreationDescription: A well-crafted website is crucial for success. We specialize in building fast, responsive, and visually compelling websites that align with your brand identity and business goals. Whether it's an e-commerce platform, a portfolio, or a corporate site, We bring ideas to life with clean and efficient code.
WhatWeOffer.mentorshipHint: Guidance for Your Growth. Empowering You with Knowledge, Skills, and Industry Insights
WhatWeOffer.mentorshipDescription: Receive personalized mentorship tailored to your unique journey. Whether you're just starting in tech or looking to advance your career, We'll provide expert insights, career advice, and hands-on guidance to help you grow with confidence.
WhatWeOffer.collabHint: Let's Build Something Together. Bringing Innovative Minds Together to Build Outstanding Projects
WhatWeOffer.collabDescription: Collaboration is key to innovation. If you have an idea, startup, or project that needs a creative and technical partner, let's connect. We bring experience in front-end development, UI/UX design, and strategic execution to ensure success.
WhatWeOffer.collabContact: Reach out to discuss your project!

Footer.footerQuote: Responsive by Design. Possible by Technology.

WhyChoose.whyChooseUsDesc: Our team is made up of professional specialists. We regularly improve our skills, develop, master new tools and technologies.

Benefits.onTimeDeliveryDesc: We ensure efficient teamwork and punctual delivery, so your project stays on track and meets every deadline
Benefits.multifunctionalSolutionsDesc: From simple websites to complex platforms, we provide versatile solutions tailored to your unique needs.
Benefits.personalizedGuidanceDesc: Learn from experienced professionals who have walked the path, helping you avoid common pitfalls and achieve faster progress.
Benefits.availabilityDesc: Access support whenever you need it—whether it’s a quick question or in-depth feedback, we’re here for you around the clock.
Benefits.openAnyIdeaDesc: No idea is too big or small. We’re here to collaborate on projects of all kinds, from creative concepts to technical challenges.
Benefits.freelanceProjectsDesc: Need a skilled developer for a short-term project? We’re available for freelance work to help you achieve your goals.

WebsiteTypes.websiteTypesDescription: We specialize in developing modern, high-performance websites tailored to your business needs.
WebsiteTypes.websitePrice: How much does it cost to create a website?
WebsiteTypes.websitePriceDescription: Submit a request, and we will provide you with a price proposal for website creation based on the technical requirements you provide.
WebsiteTypes.businessCardDesc: A simple website showcasing essential information about you or your business.
WebsiteTypes.landingPageDesc: A high-conversion page designed for special offers or marketing campaigns.

WebsiteTypes.wordPressWebsiteDesc: A website built on WordPress, offering flexibility, ease of use, and powerful content management capabilities.

MentorshipPlan.whatIsMentorshipDescription: Mentorship is a process of exchanging experience, knowledge, and advice, where the mentor, as a guide, helps the mentee develop skills, solve problems, and achieve goals.
MentorshipPlan.mentorshipProgramDescription:
The mentorship program is designed to support the professional and personal development of individuals. It is based on the interaction between experienced professionals (mentors) and students or career starters (mentees). 

The program aims to help participants develop their skills, discover their potential, and achieve their career and life goals.
whoCanParticipateItems: Career starters who want to build a successful career in technology
Individuals over 14 years old who want to develop their skills, specialize and reach new career heights
Experienced professionals who want to share their knowledge and help others
MentorshipPlan.goalsTitle: What is the purpose of the mentorship program?
mentorshipProgramBenefitsItems: Personalized Guidance. Each participant receives a personalized plan based on their goals and needs.
Experienced Mentors. The program includes support from experienced professionals who will share their knowledge and experience.
Practical Projects. Participants will work on projects, gaining practical experience.
Network Expansion. The program provides an opportunity to meet industry experts and expand your professional network.
MentorshipPlan.callToAction: This program is designed to unlock your potential and help you achieve success. If you wish to participate or learn more, contact us.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.description1: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.
PrivacyPolicy.description2: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy has been created with the help of the Privacy Policy Generator.
PrivacyPolicy.title2: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
PrivacyPolicy.description3: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:
PrivacyPolicy.description4:
Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operating offices and in any other places where the parties involved in the processing are located. It means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of Your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from Your jurisdiction. 
Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by Your submission of such information represents Your agreement to that transfer. 
The Company will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that Your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of Your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of Your data and other personal information.
PrivacyPolicy.securityOfPersonalDataDesc: The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.
PrivacyPolicy.linksOtherWebsitesDesc:
Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit.
 We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.
PrivacyPolicy.changestoPrivacyPolicyDesc:
We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. 
We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the 'Last updated' date at the top of this Privacy Policy. 
You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
PrivacyPolicy.anyQuestion: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us:
PrivacyPolicy.byVisiting: By visiting this page on our website:
